dev.williamchung.repositories

Interface Repository<T,ID>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Generic T is a standin for the object that will be stored into the repo.
    ID - Generic ID is a standin for the class that will denote the id of the object in the database (we will use Integer)
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommentRepository, ForumRepository, ThreadRepository, UserRepository

    public interface Repository<T,ID>
    This is the Repository interface. It is meant to replicate the JPA CrudRepository from Spring.
